name: Flappy Turds: Gangsta Poop Grime Music Edition
storyline:
Flappy Turds - The Game You've All Been Waiting For !!   
With Pierre The Poop.  
  
How far can you take Pierre as he strives to reach the end of his impossible journey home? Can you beat the worldwide high score and become one of the worlds Heavy Dumpers?  
  
Music courtesy of JTP and Restraint gives this a sick instrumental underground grime soundtrack.  
  
Get this game now! It's completely free!!
